name: Prowlarr
short_description: Indexer manager for automating and integrating Usenet and torrent indexers.
description: Indexer manager for automating and integrating Usenet and torrent indexers. Prowlarr is a self-hosted application focused on media, tools, torrent, download. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Prowlarr on your home server to indexer manager for automating and integrating usenet and torrent indexers without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Prowlarr to manage your media workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
